short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to reload images which failed to load just in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There are many reasons why an image in a website might fail to load, some of them fail due to site's issues another due to your internet connection interruptions. No matter what the reason is - this extension will help you to easily reload the failed images.
